Summary: Three bright lights over southern IL.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Carbondale
There were no other sightings in Carbondale on or around September 8th 2009
divs: Sighting Details I was outside this evening, as I am most nights< when I noticed a triangular shape of lights(3). I continued watching the lights as I called my wife(a complete sceptic,...as was I) to witnes the event. the lights then moved into a single file line and moved at a high rate of speed to the NE untill they disappeared. The lights did not flash or blink like a plane, but were solid white, more like a star. I have never before seen or reported anything like this. I know what I saw tonight was something special!
